title: Writing High-Fidelity YARA Rules for AI-Era Ransomware (2025)
excerpt: Traditional hash-based malware detection no longer works in 2025. This article explains how to write high-fidelity YARA rules that detect malware capabilities instead of static signatures, using a real-world case study of the AquaShell backdoor linked to recent Cisco-related attacks. Learn how modern SOC teams adapt YARA for AI-driven, polymorphic threats.
